text: What do you mean writing a paper "on julia"? Using julia, or about julia?

elements.text: What do you mean writing a paper "on julia"? Using julia, or about julia?

text: In any case, the answer is yes to both questions :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: In any case, the answer is yes to both questions

text: You can use Weave.jl with your own custom latex template to make the paper conform to the venue you're publishing in

elements.text: You can use Weave.jl with your own custom latex template to make the paper conform to the venue you're publishing in

text: Basically, about application of Julia. I'm not sure about the area though

elements.text: Basically, about application of Julia. I'm not sure about the area though

text: Any points regarding the second half?  :sweat_smile:

elements.text: Any points regarding the second half?

text:
I think in general, you need to do something like the following...
-have a research idea
-perform the research
-determine if the conclusion is a statement worth sharing with the world
-write a paper?
